participant_1.name: George

participant_1.background: my name is george. i've zero family that i am close to. my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy.

participant_2.background: i read twenty books a year. i only eat kosher. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i was raised in a single parent household.
